page.title: 04CLUBS BROWNIES
page.content: Brownies are the younger group of the Girl Guides Association .There are 10 Brownies in the Handcross Pack.It is a Club for girls aged 7 to 10.Brownies wear a brown dress with a brown belt a hat and a yellow tie.Brownies meet every week at the Parish Hall from 4.30pm until 6.00pm.We sing the Brownie song.Sometimes we have pocket or uniform inspection.In our pockets we have a tissue,a plaster, string, needle and thread, pencil, paper and a 10p for telephone calls.1985 is the 75th Anniversary of Guiding.I went to Crystal Palace for a celebration.Our leaders are called Brown Owl and Snowy Owl.
